acceptance-test-run.title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that KEYWORD field functionality works properly
acceptance-test-run.name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that KEYWORD field functionality works properly

test-group.name: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When search events by keyword {ADELE} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then found events contains {ADELE} on Event Discovery Widget page

test-step.description: Check that found events contains text: ADELE

test-group.name: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When search events by keyword {STING} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then found events contains ｟STING｠ on Event Discovery Widget page

test-step.description: Check that found events contains text: STING
test-step.error: java.lang.AssertionError: Poster windows does not contains STING, but has next text: SCHOOL OF ROCK BRUNCH: THE POLICE
